attributes.action: Limit the number of approvals of HSMP (Highly Skilled Immigrant Programme ) applications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be a limit or temporary hold on HSMP approvals in IT. The IT job market is struggling and lot of people are looking for work. Is there a point bringing an immigrant and offering him a job ( who usually take it for a lower salary )? HSMP person usually comes here as a single person and can efford to live with lower salary compared to Citizens living here with families. 
The HSMP allotment should also be based on shortage list in the country.
